92bd249c-98b1-49dd-9c2b-da6641847a3c: Add +2 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against your bombs.
7826a5b5-04ee-414c-9b87-0f266e4ea1ac: Allows you to brew potions of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} up to level 3 during {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}camping{/g}.
b2b0f416-784e-42b9-8815-1b7d77309b76: Allows you to craft scrolls during {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}camping{/g}.
e1383fcb-30a7-49a8-b593-e2492fae2c0c:
Benefit: You can bloodrage for 6 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day.
Special: You can gain Extra Bloodrage multiple times. Its effects stack.
ddb46001-ee50-4cef-98f6-da74f518143e:
Benefit: You can rage for 6 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day.
Special: You can gain Extra Rage multiple times. Its effects stack.
90b36006-7a7c-4531-9962-faf595ffd0b1:
Benefit: You can use your lay on hands ability two additional times per day.
Special: You can gain Extra Lay On Hands multiple times. Its effects stack.
b4ee38e4-e312-4f61-b9e8-a12cfb27cd8d:
Benefit: Your {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} for fighting with two weapons are reduced. The penalty for your primary hand lessens by 2 and the one for your off hand lessens by 6.
Normal: If you wield a second weapon in your off hand, you can get one extra attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} with that weapon. When fighting in this way you suffer a –6 penalty with your regular attack or attacks with your primary hand and a –10 penalty to the attack with your off hand. If your off-hand weapon is light, the penalties are reduced by 2 each. An {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strike{/g} is always considered light.
1b00fc6b-9110-4df5-8722-286cc605ba4c: Characters with this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} cast shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} at +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
4e926302-ba33-47af-a3f9-8827ebaf62dd: Choose one of the creature's special {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. Add +2 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against the special attack on which the creature focuses.
1e05546a-24cd-4193-9ae9-a135421d7377:
Harsh conditions or long exertions do not easily tire you.
Benefit: You gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics checks{/g} and +4 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saves{/g} against {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigue{/g} and {g|ConditionExhausted}exhaustion{/g}.
You may sleep in light or medium armor without becoming fatigued.
e10b3140-a347-4fb1-aa66-f9386c09c897: Humans with this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} to resist mind-affecting effects. The bonus increases to +4 if the effect is also a fear effect.
2f8a9421-fd23-4fb5-956b-d086f59373bd: If you successfully dispel an ongoing magical effect on an opponent, that opponent takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
c3748a62-c00e-480d-8e2d-2d3ea3dee494:
In melee, every time you miss because of {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}, you can {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}reroll{/g} your miss chance percentile roll one time to see if you actually hit.
An invisible attacker gets no advantages related to hitting you in melee. That is, you don't lose your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}, and the attacker doesn't get the usual +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for being invisible. The invisible attacker's bonuses do still apply for {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}, however. You also gain immunity to gaze {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
31b0dbde-80f3-478e-8d31-8751f605f771: Increase the {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by any shield you are using by 1.
79453f58-c22f-414c-bf1a-c4f9f3ae60fe: Select one advanced weapon training option, applying it to your fighter weapon groups you have selected with the weapon training class feature.
0e3cd7a2-ace7-4b47-9cfc-db762bd5017f:
Slaying an enemy demoralizes your other nearby foes.
Benefit: Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 or fewer {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, you can make a {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (to intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to demoralize all enemies within 30 feet as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. Enemies that cannot see both you and the enemy you reduced to 0 or fewer hit points are unaffected.
e3a98661-ddd0-4ca5-82c8-33d0e1bd30d5: Some elven families have such long traditions of producing wizards (and other arcane {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasters{/g}) that they raise their children with the assumption each is destined to be a powerful magic-user, with little need for mundane concerns such as skill with weapons. Elves with this racial {g|Encyclopedia:Trait}trait{/g} gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g} made to cast spells defensively, and a +1 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}.
af83669e-46d4-4b66-b6c9-256ab93738f0:
The effects of your bardic performance carry on, even after you have stopped performing.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} from your bardic performance continue for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} after you cease performing. Any other requirement, such as range or specific conditions, must still be met for the effect to continue. If you begin a new bardic performance during this time, the effects of the previous performance immediately cease.
af7b74a2-e4f5-423e-8d0d-721f21f2287b: When fighting defensively, your dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} increases by 2.
98004af9-ccbf-40d1-ac3d-cba66689c9c5: When making a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with a bow, your first attack fires two arrows. If the attack hits, both arrows hit. Apply precision-based {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (such as sneak attack) and {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} damage only once for this attack. Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from using a composite bow with a high {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonus apply to each arrow, as do other damage bonuses, such as a ranger's favored enemy bonus. {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}Damage reduction{/g} and resistances apply separately to each arrow.
cd7627d7-43bf-4e38-8a94-290c82da78a3: When you successfully make a targeted dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} against an opponent, that opponent must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + 1/2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} + casting ability modifier) or be {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g} until the start of your next turn. If the save succeeds, the opponent is instead {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
e8318703-7e08-42cc-9414-c593657aeca1: When you use Pummeling Style to make an entire full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} or flurry of blows against a single target, if you hit with any of your attacks, you attempt a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
fad65fa7-5d41-4c85-9328-6ecf0dbbac29: When you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an opponent with a Power Attack, you may make an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} to attempt to demoralize your opponent.
bf6458dc-9efc-4879-8149-f0fff6f83d5e: Whenever you channel positive energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} the living or channel negative energy to heal the undead, you do not affect enemies. When you channel positive energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} undead or channel negative energy to damage living, you do not affect allies.
18a662b6-a54d-467c-902b-d0b453a5bd43: While wielding a ranged weapon, you {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threaten squares{/g} within your melee reach. You can make {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} with that ranged weapon. You do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} of opportunity when making a {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} as an attack of opportunity.
5fe038e0-45e7-42c5-8a42-ac4fbf042239: With a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}light weapon{/g}, elven curve blade, estoc, or rapier made for a creature of your {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category, you may use your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
ea68ae08-913f-441d-9e78-238fc7ce9b63: You are especially hard to kill. When your hit point total is below 0 but you are not killed, you can fight on for 1 more {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as if disabled. At the end of your next turn, unless brought to above 0 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, you immediately fall {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}.
b561da91-6530-4b28-8657-856fa806f80d:
You are especially resistant to magic.
Benefit: You receive a +4 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g}. This replaces the normal bonus from the dwarf's Hardy racial {g|Encyclopedia:Trait}trait{/g}.
Normal: Dwarves normally receive a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities.
854209f6-0c0f-4ebd-8652-7f60f4d00a0d:
You are skilled at deflecting blows with your shield.
Benefit: Increase the {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by any shield you are using by 1. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Shield Focus.
beb14fd8-17e4-4a93-8c6e-88fcb65a217c:
You become even more resistant to Enchantment {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, gaining an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against them.
Additionally, the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of enchantment spells you cast increases by 1.
c664eee5-783f-4ce5-9172-34118feec836: You can cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} while using wild shape. You substitute various noises and gestures for the normal verbal and somatic components of a spell.
1778a324-a351-421e-ae92-b46c95635171: You can channel energy two additional times per day.
b4f77210-8506-405e-9a4f-685764b84911:
You can easily move through a dangerous melee.
Benefit: You get a +4 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} caused when you move out of or within a {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened area{/g}. A condition that makes you lose your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus to Armor Class (if any) also makes you lose dodge bonuses.
Dodge bonuses stack with each other, unlike most types of bonuses.
3a80404c-0d7b-489f-9597-4121c2f3b3a1:
You can invoke your aspect's minor form longer than most.
Add your {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} (minimum 1) to the number of minutes per day that you can use your shifter aspect ability to assume a minor form.
cb31a473-c67d-43a0-8879-1c3032e3bb79: You can make a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, plus your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier. You're considered proficient in this attack and can apply {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} or effects appropriate to {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} to it. If used as part of a full attack action, the bite is considered a secondary attack and is made at your full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} –5, and adds half your Strength modifier to damage.
a5c87d6c-410f-4c1e-b959-68b755fdccb3: You can shoot or throw ranged weapons at an opponent engaged in melee without taking the standard –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}.
9e4933b5-d2d7-444e-83b8-fac492d4e346:
You can stab your enemies with your sword or another {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing{/g} weapon.
Benefit: Choose one kind of light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} slashing weapon (such as the longsword). When wielding your chosen weapon one-handed, you can treat it as a one-handed piercing melee weapon for all {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} and class abilities that require such a weapon (such as a duelist's precise strike) and you can add your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier to that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. The weapon must be one appropriate for your {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}.
You do not gain this benefit while fighting with two weapons or using flurry of blows, or any time another hand is otherwise occupied.
7a93a852-9525-4f8a-af30-ebfab1da5682: You can throw four additional bombs per day.
57ca714c-1e75-4fa3-b55c-b571728449d7: You can use bardic performance for 6 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day.
e1012a8a-64d2-48c4-bdfe-863663dd6868: You can use inquisitor's bane weapon ability for 3 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day.
2f899e62-2c00-436c-bffe-9fe505daa5b0: You can use raging song for 6 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day.
46c11f27-fad0-40a9-bde4-6703c9c22c9d: You can use stigmata for 6 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day.
62e25c7e-b86a-46cd-bc17-b97297eb0a19:
You excel at defending yourself from all manner of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g}.
Benefit: You treat your total {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} as your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} when calculating your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g}.
84407102-ed9e-4c0f-b706-dd455cb4e1be:
You follow a powerful blow from your weapon with an opportunistic bash from your shield.
Benefit: Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} with a melee weapon, you can make a shield bash {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} against the same target using the same {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
063c74e3-ee81-457e-83b6-3efa79ae5678: You gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. For every {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g} you possess beyond 3, you gain an additional +1 hit point. If you have more than 3 Hit Dice, you gain +1 hit points whenever you gain a Hit Die (such as when you gain a level).
9dcf2080-3d54-4c10-8f18-9832dadf1bdb: You gain a +1 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. A condition that makes you lose your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} bonus to AC also makes you lose the benefits of this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
dc0617a6-db78-417d-a042-2e035147bbe0: You gain a +1 natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} due to your unusually tough hide.
eb588be2-40a8-4c9f-800d-8745328059bc: You gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} and a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g}.
0bbeff73-a744-420e-b677-06004f2a78a4: You gain a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against any effect causing the {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} or {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} conditions and against all poisons.
e68538f8-5e79-46f1-b5dc-f2f96fa3a5be: You gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} as long as you start combat with a dueling sword. As long as you wield only a single dueling sword in one hand (not using a shield or an off-hand weapon), you gain a +2 shield bonus to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. Although the dueling sword deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g}, you treat it as if it were also a piercing weapon when determining the effects of weapons used by a duelist.
5b0d8db6-7395-47d5-a564-6ef12cc5601b: You gain one additional {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} point per level.
ac47105f-7964-47f5-bde2-c799cee6fe06: You get a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with ranged weapons at ranges of up to 30 feet.
eac51b7a-0505-4f50-97ba-2d77b2b285bf:
You get a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with ranged weapons at ranges of up to 30 feet.
This ability forces you to come into a 30-foot range of the enemy you are attacking, to ensure you gain the bonuses from Point-Blank Shot {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
4ce66560-4764-493c-84a2-423d95399fab: You get a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all Knowledge and Lore {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
a3b68f78-7ed4-44e8-8766-f26a8be62057: You get a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
32445684-599f-4e9f-ba42-90e84c76e769: You get a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
26ad2a94-8998-4e4f-b820-d278997ebd61: You get a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
08027b34-0d8f-4738-8277-0fcdb5c77a98: You get a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Use_Magic_Device}Use Magic Device{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
3427c811-06dc-4ab2-a046-5318e4b9aab3: You get a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. If you have 10 or more ranks in that skill, the bonus increases to +4.
a68368e8-70c5-4115-b3e1-701fc93f3f79: You get a second {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with your off-hand weapon, albeit at a –5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
dc38ad2f-2d3c-45b9-aea1-a1424c786242: You get a third {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with your off-hand weapon, albeit at a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
798bc93e-144b-4c93-8238-8bfcbc550c4a:
You have learned how to cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} while wearing armor.
Benefit: Reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Fail_Chance}arcane spell failure chance{/g} due to the armor you are wearing by 10% for any spells you cast.
b5a899a0-1f49-4ae4-9985-f7043d76da7f:
You have mastered the ability to cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} while wearing armor.
Benefit: Reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Fail_Chance}arcane spell failure chance{/g} due to the armor you are wearing by 20% for any spells you cast. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} replaces, and does not stack with, the bonus granted by Arcane Armor Training.
c279352e-addf-4e84-9337-60649b792553: You may make a number of additional {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. With this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you may also make {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} of opportunity while {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g}.
ef86c215-3577-4959-9e97-24d08d63961e: You must be using a light, heavy, or tower shield to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. You add your shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Touch_AC}touch AC{/g}. This does not include any enhancement bonus from a magic shield in this calculation.
f3f388e7-e8d3-4808-a7e1-f0a667b5a04e: You must be using a shield to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} when you would normally be hit with an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} from a ranged weapon (not including {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effects, {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}, or massive ranged weapons), you may deflect it so that you take no {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, as if you had the Deflect Arrows feat. You must be aware of the attack and not {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g}.
1f498c5e-89a2-4351-9635-ac03d1cf7b64: You possess the elven magic racial {g|Encyclopedia:Trait}trait{/g} of the elves, granting you a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}. In addition, you receive a +2 racial bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_Arcana}Knowledge (arcana){/g} checks made to identify the properties of magic items.
e599597f-e10f-4d22-8de7-5945fb5b9624: You receive a +1 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} made with thrown splash weapons.
3ecbb197-260c-4481-8f7d-894ab102b4f8: You receive a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against Illusion {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and effects and a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Use_Magic_Device}Use Magic Device{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
c4c13324-06ad-4960-871d-19b288a117cc:
You repeatedly strike the same location, causing increasing amounts of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
Benefit: When you make a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, each consecutive hit against the same opponent deals extra damage equal to the number of previous consecutive hits you have made against that opponent this turn. This damage is multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}.
ec6caf02-7d2d-4f42-9e30-7d40622440b1:
You take a moment to carefully aim your shots, causing them all to strike nearly the same spot.
Benefit: When you use a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} to make multiple {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged weapon attacks{/g} against the same opponent, total the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from all hits before applying that opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
e88d6d97-269a-40d3-a9d6-8eb03f648568: You {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threaten{/g} an additional 5 feet with Snap Shot.
02d4e603-47ab-40ed-97dd-e9e6d7625ca9: You {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threaten{/g} an additional 5 feet with Snap Shot. Additionally, whenever you make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} using a ranged weapon and hit, you gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g} and a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} to confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} with that {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. These bonuses increase to +4 when you have {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} +16, and to +6 when you have base attack bonus +20.
c73ac51d-c789-4f75-b775-92e58f69085b:
You've learned to use your quickness in place of brute force when performing {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g}.
Benefit: You add your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus to your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} when determining your {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}Combat Maneuver Bonus{/g} instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} bonus.
Normal: You add your Strength bonus to your base attack bonus and size bonus when determining your Combat Maneuver Bonus.
b1f628f3-54a4-4f5d-91ca-354fb2aed39e:
Your arcane pool increases by 2.
You can gain this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} multiple times. Its effects stack, granting you an increase to your arcane pool each time you take this feat.
31059668-72d8-4977-b66c-7cab84feb0d6:
Your bond with your animal companion is unusually close.
The abilities of your animal companion are calculated as though your class were 4 levels higher, to a maximum effective level equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}.
d6f409ed-280f-40f9-b8c7-5d5a9af79f56:
Your charge ends with a mighty haymaker.
Benefit: You can charge and make a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} or flurry of blows at the end of your charge as part of the charge action. You can use Pummeling Charge in this way only if all of your attacks qualify for using Pummeling Style against a single target.
3d03da8d-0277-40dd-8b44-8eb596944ff1:
Your dashing style and fluid fencing forms allow you to use agility rather than brute force to fell your foes.
Benefits: Choose one kind of light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon (such as the rapier). When wielding your chosen weapon one-handed, you can add your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier to that weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. You do not gain this benefit while fighting with two weapons or using flurry of blows, or anytime another hand is otherwise occupied. You can still use buckler in your off-hand.
3ab43615-ee20-4ad3-acee-c060ed28580e:
Your mastery of the shield allows you to fight with it without hindrance.
Benefit: You do not suffer any {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} made with a shield while you are wielding another weapon. Add your shield's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} made with the shield as if it were a weapon enhancement bonus.
54d8cf6d-a35e-4ff2-a2ee-f357ca29b555:
Your off-hand weapon while dual-wielding strikes with greater power.
Benefit: Add your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} made with your off-hand weapon.
Normal: You normally add only half of your Strength modifier to damage rolls made with a weapon wielded in your off-hand.
4424f3bc-11f8-4782-8051-632a7c0c947b:
Your physical might is intimidating to others.
Benefit: Add your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier to {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} (when used to intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} in addition to your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier.
1fa42f0e-c662-4626-a2a5-8df722151a4b: Your quick reflexes allow you to react rapidly to danger. You get a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
6c686cda-1a41-47f9-ba2d-a03f280d5781: Your secondary {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} (including attacks treated as secondary as a result of being altered by the shifter's fury ability) take only a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} instead of –5.
789f715c-ff9c-47f7-895e-4d20fc876982:
Your sneak attack {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases by {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}.
Your number of sneak attack dice cannot exceed half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} (rounded up).
744e0c75-1f4c-4b7a-8d41-def3ceb3e4e4: Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made with weapons selected with Weapon Focus ignore up to 10 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
e29a0d96-7d0d-4ee8-a853-deca1dba037d: Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made with weapons selected with Weapon Focus ignore up to 5 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
7d59426f-29b0-446a-b94d-409efa7fef8d:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} ignore the miss chance for less than total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}, and you treat opponents with total concealment as if they had normal concealment (20% miss chance instead of 50%). You may still {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}reroll{/g} a miss chance percentile roll as normal.
If you successfully pinpoint an invisible or hidden attacker, that attacker gets no advantages related to hitting you with {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}, regardless of the range. That is, you don't lose your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}, and the attacker doesn't get the usual +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for being invisible.
79ae885b-51a1-4f8c-8ee6-d174e3f20cee: Your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} ignore the miss chance for less than total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}. You may still {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}reroll{/g} your miss chance percentile roll for total concealment. If you successfully pinpoint an invisible or hidden attacker within 30 feet, that attacker gets no advantages related to hitting you with {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}. That is, you don't lose your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}, and the attacker doesn't get the usual +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for being invisible.
0c24e718-b23b-434c-987d-ec4a0e13acd6:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} ignore anything but total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} and cover.
Benefit: Your ranged attacks ignore the miss chance granted to targets by anything less than total concealment. Total concealment provides their normal benefits against your ranged attacks.
c3af632b-b3a7-4c59-92e0-d2056be4e5aa:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} break through {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} much more easily than most.
You get a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + caster level) made to overcome a creature's spell resistance. This bonus stacks with the one from Spell Penetration.
5d4a2c6f-beb5-4923-b4dc-7ffa46299d49:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strikes{/g} weave together in an effortless combo, focusing on the spots you've weakened with the last hit.
Benefit: Whenever you use a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} or flurry of blows to make multiple attacks against a single opponent with unarmed strikes, total the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from all hits before applying {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. This ability works only with unarmed strikes, no matter what other abilities you might possess.
